title: Constipation, Tommy's Wife's Gift, Carla's Reality Update, Kenya Attack and more.
itunes:title: Constipation, Tommy's Wife's Gift, Carla's Reality Update, Kenya Attack and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Tommy and his wife have not argued in 2020. He needs help for her birthday gift. The crew have a constipation debate. If your significant other's team loses, Junior has advice just for you. Steve on Watch premieres on Facebook. Miss Carla covers Power in the first Reality Update of 2020. Three Americans were killed in Kenya. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about an attitude adjustment, expectation and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
